photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

isPlaidConnected.description: Indicates if the user has connected a Plaid item.

plaidItem.title: Plaid Item
plaidItem.description: Represents a Plaid item with an access token.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this item.

accessToken.description: The access token for the Plaid item.

itemId.description: The ID of the Plaid item.

cursor.description: The cursor for the last transaction sync.

createdAt.description: The date and time the item was created.

plaidTransaction.title: Plaid Transaction
plaidTransaction.description: Represents a single transaction from Plaid.

cashFlowProjection.title: Cash Flow Projection
cashFlowProjection.description: Represents a user's cash flow projection.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this projection.

forecast.description: A text summary of the cash flow forecast.

projectionData.description: An array of daily projected balances.

createdAt.description: The date and time the projection was created.

savingsPlan.title: Savings Plan
savingsPlan.description: Represents an AI-generated savings plan for a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this plan.

projectedShortfall.description: The projected amount of the shortfall, if any.

createdAt.description: The date and time the plan was created.

/users/{userId}/transactions/{transactio.description: Stores individual Plaid transactions for a user.

/plaid_items/{userId}.description: Stores Plaid access tokens and sync cursors for each user.

/cash_flow_projections/{userId}.description: Stores cash flow projections for each user.

/savings_plans/{userId}.description: Stores AI-generated savings plans for each user.
